item.title: Animation's not working
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Mod Nate, post:9, topic:76308”]Apperently you dont know how to code…[/quote]I know how to code well enough to know when an Animation should work and when it shouldn’t, and I’ve learned through experience that equalsIgnoreCase works just as well as startsWith. I also am good enough at coding to know something else is wrong in my Source other than that little Section of Animation commands that is making none of my Animation’s work. I made this thread to see if anyone had any idea of what I could change to make the Animations work again. So, why do you think I don’t know how to code?

Read full topic
